title: Ecuador declares prison emergency after scores killed in gang battle, some beheaded
content:
1. Ecuador declares prison emergency after scores killed in gang battle, some beheaded  NBC News
  2. At least 100 people killed and 52 injured in Ecuador prison | Latest English News | WION  WION
  3. Ecuador declares emergency in prisons after 116 inmates killed  Al Jazeera English
  4. Over 100 killed in bloody Ecuador prison massacre  CNN
  5. Prison Riot in Ecuador Leaves More Than 100 Dead, With Some Beheaded in Melee  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: エクアドル、ギャングの抗争で多数の死者が出た後、刑務所の緊急事態を宣言、一部は斬首される
厄瓜多尔宣布监狱紧急状态，此前有数十人在帮派斗争中被杀，一些人被斩首
厄瓜多爾宣佈監獄緊急狀態，此前有數十人在幫派鬥爭中被殺，一些人被斬首
